name: psrbagf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c2, c0, cn0))
-| wceq(c3, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))

stmt.origin: simprbda(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c2, c0, cn0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cn), cfn))
stmt.pretty: simprbda(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (c2 : c0 → ℕ0), (`' c2 " ℕ)∈ Fin)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c2, c0, cn0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wf(c2, c0, cn0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cn), cfn))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c2, c0, cn0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wf(c2, c0, cn0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cn), cfn))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wf(c2, c0, cn0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cn), cfn))))
-| wceq(c3, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c2, c0, cn0))
-| wceq(c3, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: A finite bag is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
